name: Deep Dungeon (eltoba)
description:
Game created in 1 week for the 2021/06 GoGodot Jam.

A short adventure game in which you enter the cave of the protagonist's memories. Includes a Boss fight. Hope you enjoy it!

CONTROLS
Keyboard: WASD - Movement / Space - Action
or you may use a joypad.

Browser version preferred. Downloadable versions may crash unexpectedly due to issues I'll address once I get some free time.

Feedback welcome : )
